DOC.detailed_description: A clinical study Zagreb Croatia , intend evaluate Aer-O-Scope Colonoscope System . The study include 120 subject follow endpoint : Evaluation Aer-O-Scope advancement , image retraction throughout Colon . Safety : No occurrence device related major adverse event ( detail see section 9.5 ) Efficacy : 1 . Advancement device towards ceacum retraction 2 . Visualization colon mucosa travel image device 3 . Procedure duration 4 . Handling operation ( assessment operator )
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer 18 65 year age . Sign inform consent . Subjects know GI related symptom complaint GI disease . Subjects cancer life threaten disease condition . Pregnant woman . Subjects underwent abdominal surgery . Morbid Obesity ( BMI > 40 ) . Drug abuse alcoholism . Bedridden subject . Inadequate communication subject . Subjects custodial care . Participation clinical study within last 30 day . Subjects know cardiovascular pulmonary disease .
